writer.name: 尤里西·塞德尔 Ulrich Seidl
米歇尔·格拉沃格 Michael Glawogger
维罗妮卡·弗兰茨 Veronika Franz
赛佛林·费奥拉 Severin Fiala

director.name: 尤里西·塞德尔 Ulrich Seidl

introduction: In the waning days of the 18th century, the notorious robber, thief and murderer Johann Georg Grasel (1790-1818) carried out his bloody deeds in the northern Waldviertel region of Austria. With his implacable documentary realism, Ulrich Seidl follows the story of this angry young man who became a myth during his lifetime. The rise and fall of a legendary criminal and a film portrait of Austrian society during the Napoleonic Wars in Ulrich Seidl's first historical drama.
